website_summaries.verdict: A basic collapsible bucket made from a durable material that does not leak.
pros: Works well as a cleaning bucket
A good bucket made from good quality, durable material
cons: This bucket holds water well, but may have problems collapsing while full of water

customer_reviews.title: Aware of product
customer_reviews.text: I've used this bucket for both a trash can and washing bucket for my RV for about 2 months. I have to make people who are looking at this product for reviews aware of a couple things. This is a collapsible bucket. Its not going to be rigid when standing. However I find it light weight and reasonable for my uses. Oh ya I also used it as an ice chest for beer. I am very happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Cerne

customer_reviews.title: Good Bucket
customer_reviews.text: Good bucket, seems well-built and sturdy. Expands and collapses easily. I filled it up and let it sit outside for a couple of hours and it did leak a bit from the seam, maybe one or two tablespoons worth of water, so it's not completely watertight. If not for the minor seepage I'd give it five stars. But it should work well for what I purchased it for.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Lundquist

customer_reviews.title: Handle pops out.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second product of which both seem to have been made the same way. I've found the handle tends to pop out of the top ring/frame of the bucket. Once out it won't really hold again even if you push it back in. But I like the collapsible bucket so I create my own handle by pushing a wire all the way through the hole for the handle and twisting it back on itself above. That holds fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I really like the convenience of this product. I actually washed my car for the first time and was truly pleased with the results. Once filled with water it is not too heavy to carry so I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: N. Craddieth

customer_reviews.title: Great product 👍🏼. Great price 😊.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product 👍🏼. Durable and collapsible, nice to keep in the car for the beach (kids love it), camping, somewhere to water flowers, and more, plus cleans easily. Nicely priced so I’m going to buy more as unique gift for friends.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Partridge, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Light Bucket
customer_reviews.text: This bucket have many uses. Hold water but be careful filling. Nice to fold up. Not way much. Easy carry.
customer_reviews.author: Darling Clementine

customer_reviews.title: Compact and conveinent.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, well made, compact, good capacity ~2 gal. Worth the money which ain't a lot! Put bottled water and ice for a days trip in Moab. Worked great!
customer_reviews.author: American GunStar

customer_reviews.title: Collapsable bucket
customer_reviews.text: This was bought as a gift but it appears to be of high quality and durability. Time will tell
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Obman

customer_reviews.title: What’s fine I just wish it was a little bigger
customer_reviews.text: What’s fine I just wish it was a little bigger, but then again I guess I purchase a small size.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Needed something for outside chores, le cleaning the mailbox, birdbath.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. It would be better if it come in bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: FunDad

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: very practical and does not take a lot of space
customer_reviews.author: George Hajjar

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Great product picture quality is better than cable that i had.
customer_reviews.author: Hallie Hotchkiss

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this technology, it collapses and expands, so that makes it easy-to-use and store. It is a cool product for many usage.
customer_reviews.author: Donald
